title: Graduated as a Computer Engineer
description: In May 2018, I completed my undergraduate degree, majoring in Computer Engineering from Mumbai University (Dwarkadas J. Sanghvi College of Engineering). And thus began my beautiful 'Computer Science' journey :)

title: Started working at Morgan Stanley
description: After 4 amazing years of Engineering, I was placed into Morgan Stanley. On 6th August, 2018 I joined as a Technology Analyst and I started with their 4-month long "Technology Analyst Program" training!

title: Promoted to an Associate
description: Soon after my training ended, I joined the Cash Confirmations team in Mumbai. As I was beginning to understand their Java-based tech stack and system, I was promoted to an Associate (SDE) role!

title: Recognized for 'Taking Ownership'
description: After completing a challenging but interesting 5-month long project, I received a department-wise recognition for 'Taking Ownerhsip'. Being the first professional project of my career, it will always be special to me!

title: Promoted to a Senior Associate
description: After a year of complex projects, tasks, challenges, numerous extracurricular and volunteering activities, I was promoted to a 'Senior Associate' (SDE) position. This was my 2nd promotion in a row! :D

title: Started the most complex project ever
description: June 2020. The month when I started the most complex project of my career (yet). I won't go into the details but if we start measuring the logical complexity of projects, 100 being the max value, this was a solid 85!

title: Promoted to a Manager!
description: Another year, another promotion! This one was a huge surpise. My manager knew that I was planning on leaving Morgan Stanley, but she was so impressed by my work that she promoted me to Manager (SDE) position! (3rd in a row!)

title: Started my MS in Computer Science
description: On 7th August 2021, I moved to the United States of America to pursue my Master's degree in Computer Science!! Leaving my family, my home, my country was a big leap but I wouldn't have it any other way!

title: Summer internship at Salesforce! ‚òÅ
description: After months of preparation, hard work and relentless leetcoding, I was able to secure a Software Engineer internship at Salesforce! It was a huge achievement for me and I have loved every moment of this internship!

title: Spring 2023 internship at Motorq
description: In my final semester of my Master's degree, I decided to pursue another Software Development Engineer internship at Motorq, Inc. This company, being startup, was a unique experience!
